Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

OperatorFrozen(address,address).details: The `slashingContract` must have permission to slash the `slashedOperator`, i.e. `canSlash(slasherOperator, slashingContract)` must return 'true'.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause(uint256).details: This function can only pause functionality, and thus cannot 'unflip' any bit in `_paused` from 1 to 0.

params.newPausedStatus: represents the new value for `_paused` to take, which means it may flip several bits at once.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause(uint256).details: This function can only unpause functionality, and thus cannot 'flip' any bit in `_paused` from 0 to 1.

params.newPausedStatus: represents the new value for `_paused` to take, which means it may flip several bits at once.

FrozenStatusReset(address).notice: Emitted when `previouslySlashedAddress` is 'unfrozen', allowing them to again move deposited funds within BinLayer.

MiddlewareTimesAdded(address,uint256,uin.notice: Emitted when a middleware times is added to `operator`'s array.

OptedIntoSlashing(address,address).notice: Emitted when `operator` begins to allow `contractAddress` to slash them.

Paused(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`, and changed to `newPausedStatus`.

PauserRegistrySet(address,address).notice: Emitted when the `pauserRegistry` is set to `newPauserRegistry`.

SlashingAbilityRevoked(address,address,u.notice: Emitted when `contractAddress` signals that it will no longer be able to slash `operator` after the `contractCanSlashOperatorUntilTimestamp`.

Unpaused(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`, and changed to `newPausedStatus`.

pause(uint256).notice: This function is used to pause an BinLayer contract's functionality. It is permissioned to the `pauser` address, which is expected to be a low threshold multisig.

paused().notice: Returns the current paused status as a uint256.

paused(uint8).notice: Returns 'true' if the `indexed`th bit of `_paused` is 1, and 'false' otherwise

pauserRegistry().notice: Address of the `PauserRegistry` contract that this contract defers to for determining access control (for pausing).

setPauserRegistry(address).notice: Allows the unpauser to set a new pauser registry

unpause(uint256).notice: This function is used to unpause an BinLayer contract's functionality. It is permissioned to the `unpauser` address, which is expected to be a high threshold multisig or governance contract.

userdoc.notice: This contract is not in use as of the BinLayer release.
